name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nicodemo COLON, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nicodemo COLON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Superior Court reversed. See Morrison v. Commonwealth, Department of Public Welfare, 538 Pa. 122, 646 A.2d 565 (1994).
CASTILLE, J., dissents.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Jeffrey P. Shender, Philadelphia, for Nicodemo Colon.
Catherine Marshall, Joan Weiner, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth. i
casebody.head_matter:
667 A.2d 210
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nicodemo COLON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1995.
Decided Nov. 22, 1995.
John W. Packel, Jeffrey P. Shender, Philadelphia, for Nicodemo Colon.
Catherine Marshall, Joan Weiner, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth. i
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
